title: This Ryzen 9 Notebook Is AMAZING - Zephyrus G14 Review
description: The ASUS Zephyrus G14 gaming notebook is one of the first with the new Ryzen 9 4900HS CPU.  In this review we look at CPU performance, battery life and more to see if this new notebook processor compares to the Intel i9-9980HK and i7-9750H.  Buy items in this video from Amazon & other partners at the links below:  ASUS Zephyrus G14 -  Razer Huntsman TE -    Subscribe    Review unit provided free of charge by ASUS. This video is sponsored by Razer. As per Hardware Canucks guidelines, no review direction was received from manufacturer. As an Amazon Associate we earn from qualifying purchases.   Gear list (Available on Amazon):  Main Camera (Dmitry) -  Main Lens (Dmitry) -  Main Camera (Eber) -  Main Lens (Eber) -  Main 2nd Lens (Eber) -  Main Camera Mic (D & E) -  Cheap 4K Camera (Panasonic G7) -  Awesome Slider -  Our Shotgun Mic -  ------------------------------------------------------------ Our full site:  Join Our Forums:   Follow us for more updates! Twitter  FaceBook  Instagram  -------------------------------------------------------  #zephyrusg14 #bestgaminglaptop2020 #ryzennotebook
